entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
